constituent: drowning, water, water droplets, water pistol, weak, bow, ice, bow2, ice2
heisigStory: Water . . . weak. Do not confuse the meaning of this key word with "Drown" (Frame 763), which is closer to "founder."
koohiiStory1: Weak people placed in the water start drowning. Get some strength in those arms and learn how to swim!
koohiiStory2: Weak swimmers drowning in the water.
